title: Long March 2C launches 9 navigation test satellites for Chinese automaker
summary: A Long March 2C launched nine positioning and connectivity test satellites early Thursday, in a first step for a constellation to support autonomous driving for automaker Geely.

title: Momentus attempting to fix anomalies with first Vigoride tug
summary: A week after the launch of its first space tug, Momentus is still dealing with “anomalies” with the vehicle, but the company’s chief executive remains optimistic those issues will be resolved.

title: Chinese automaker launches nine satellites to aid self-driving cars
summary: China’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group launched the first nine satellites of a planned constellation of 240 spacecraft Thursday, starting the deployment phase of a project intended to provide navigation and inter-vehicle communications for autonomous cars.

title: NASA chooses two companies to build spacesuits for its 21st-century Moonwalkers
summary: "We knew there was always a transition to industry in our future."
